title: MANDARA SPA
description: Discover the ultimate relaxation at the Mandara Spa on your dream cruise! Indulge in serene ambience and luxury while cruising with Norwegian Cruise Line.
text:
MANDARA SPA
Welcome to a place where the ocean meets the healing waters within - the world-famous Mandara Spa and Salon®. Self-care rises to new levels here with the newest and best massages, facials, acupuncture and more. Rejuvenate from the outside in at our adults-only Thermal Suite with multiple saunas, vitality pools and therapeutic rooms. Hit the salon for a variety of beauty services or leave your cruise looking refreshed and glowing with a treatment from our Med Spa.
Elegido el mejor spa en crucero del mundo en los World Spa Awards
¡NUEVO! You can now reserve the Thermal Suite or book spa services ahead of your cruise.
Awaken Your SensesTHE THERMAL SUITE
Slip into warm water and let massaging jets relieve any tension. Take advantage of Thalassotherapy, which harnesses the soothing properties of the sea to reduce soreness, improve skin conditions and boost mood.
This expansive relaxation area soars above the ocean offering breathtaking views of the horizon and beyond. Lay back and unwind in one of our guest-favorite hot stone loungers as you stare out at the sea.
Time to chill out! Cool off in our refreshing Snow Room, Ice Room or Rain Showers. Cold therapy has been shown to help increase blood circulation, awaken the senses, invigorate the respiratory tract, and strengthen the immune system. Cold exposure can even make hair and nails shinier.
From classic Finnish to detoxifying charcoal to cutting-edge infrared, all of the saunas in the Thermal Suite create relaxation from head to toe. Benefits of heat therapy include everything from pain relief to toxin removal to improved sleep.
Experience the subtle and soothing effects of the salt chamber. Himalayan salt creates a healing oasis akin to ancient natural salt caves. Dry Salt therapy can alleviate health problems, reduce stress, improve skin and help with insomnia.
Our aromatic, temperature controlled steam rooms provide the relaxing warmth of plant-essence infused steam. The herbal extracts can help combat stress, clear congestion, improve skin health and even lower blood pressure.
Serenity On The SeaSpa Treatment Highlights
Facials & Skin SolutionsExperience the ultimate in advanced skincare. Mandara features award-winning Elemis and Biotec - where groundbreaking technology meets active ingredients.
DYSPORT® Wrinkle TreatmentSoften fine lines and wrinkles on the upper face for a refreshed, youthful appearance. Smoother-looking skin is visible within days and lasts up to four months.
AcupunturaOne of the fastest growing alternative therapies, acupuncture can address pain management, seasickness, smoking cessation, insomnia and anxiety.
Couples TreatmentsFrom deep tissue massage to Swedish massage to seaweed wraps, all of our most popular treatments can be booked as an individual or as a couple. Delve into relaxation side-by-side.
Dynamic Resurfacing Precision PeelThis potent resurfacing treatment reveals smoother, younger looking skin. A steam extraction cleanses at a deep level.
Masaje con algas marinas Aroma SpaEl poder de la aromaterapia se combina con las riquezas del océano en este tratamiento profundamente agradable. Includes a half or full body massage.
Tratamiento exfoliante de desintoxicación profunda con salThe extraordinary cleansing power of salt goes to work in this body polishing treatment delivering soft, invigorated skin. Includes a massage.
More Than MassagesBEYOND THE SPA
Salón de belleza
Let your beauty shine through with salon services for men and women. Professional shaves, blowouts, waxing, nail services and more. We proudly feature Kerastase personalized hair treatments to nourish, repair and strengthen your hair.
[Fitness & Wellness Center](https://es.ncl.com/why-cruise-norwegian/fitness)
Every ship features a state-of-the-art fitness center with your favorite workout equipment like treadmills, ellipticals, steppers, medicine & fit balls, and free weights. Classes include yoga, Pilates and spinning. We also offer personal training and body composition analysis to understand your body's inner health.
